news_list.news: Our paper preprint Audio-Maestro & Adaptive Vector Steering is released! Thanks for the great help from ASUS and Prof. Hung-Yi Lee!
We successfully completed the NTU Continuing Education Workshop on AI Agents & Multimodal Models! Thanks to the 340 professionals and students for participating!
Our paper preprint TASTE is released! Thanks for the great help from MediaTek Research and Prof. Hung-Yi Lee!
We won the Third Place in 2025 Interspeech SUPERB Challenge!
Our paper was accepted by Journal of Microbiology, Immunology and Infection and published in Volume 58, Issue 1!

paper_list.title: TASTE: Text-Aligned Speech Tokenization and Embedding for Spoken Language Modeling
paper_list.abstract: Submitted to ICLR 2026; an innovative paradigm which aligns speech tokens with corresponding text during tokenization.

paper_list.title: Audio-Maestro: Enhancing Large Audio-Language Models with Tool-Augmented Reasoning
paper_list.abstract: Enhancing large audio-language models with tool-augmented reasoning, achieving up to 5% absolute improvement on MMAU.

paper_list.title: AEGIS: Automated Co-Evolutionary Framework for Guarding Prompt Injections Schema
paper_list.abstract: An automated co-evolutionary framework to guard prompt-injection schemas. AEGIS consistently improves both attack and defense prompts over successive iterations, achieving SOTA robustness against real-world injection attempts while preserving utility on benign inputs

paper_list.title: Adaptive Vector Steering: A Training-free, Layer-wise Intervention For Hallucination Mitigation In Large Audio and Multimodal Models
paper_list.abstract: A training-free, layer-wise vector steering intervention to mitigate hallucinations in large audio and multimodal models, achieving 8% relative improvement on Hallucination QA.

paper_list.title: Signatures of lower respiratory tract microbiome in children with severe community-acquired pneumonia using shotgun metagenomic sequencing
paper_list.conference: Journal of Microbiology, Immunology and Infection, Volume 58, Issue 1, February 2025, Pages 86-93
paper_list.abstract: Conducted a prospective cohort study to recruit children under 18 who required admission to an intensive care unit for community-acquired pneumonia between December 2019 and February 2022.

exp_list.title: ML Research Scientist Intern, ASUS
exp_list.advisor: Advised by Prof. Hung-Yi Lee and Dau-Cheng Lyu (Google Scholar)
exp_list.intro: Research on hallucination mitigation and tool-augmented audio-language models.
details: Proposed a weighted adaptive steering vector to mitigate hallucination in large audio models under low-computation settings, achieving a 6% F1-score improvement.
Developed the Audio-Maestro framework to enable audio-language models to autonomously use auto-generated tools, improving accuracy by up to 5% on MMAU with low computing resources.

exp_list.title: Deep Learning Engineer Intern, MediaTek Research
exp_list.advisor: Advised by Prof. Hung-Yi Lee and Dr. Da-Shan Shiu
exp_list.intro: Co-developed a speech-text aligned tokenizer and fine-tuned Llama-1B-TASTE-V0.
details: Co-developed the first speech-text aligned tokenizer and fine-tuned Llama-1B-TASTE-V0, enabling speech integration in LLMs without degrading text performance.
Optimized training pipelines by converting ONNX models to PyTorch and building a parallelized audio processing/inference architecture.

exp_list.title: AI Engineer Intern, NXP Semiconductors
exp_list.intro: Prototyped an AWS-based LLM chat interface with Autogen Studio for product engineers.
details: Prototyped an AWS-based LLM chat interface with Autogen Studio to streamline workflows for product engineers across Singapore and the USA.
Enhanced on-device anomaly detection using RAG and multi-agent techniques, improving accuracy of 1B local models for wafer defect analysis.

exp_list.title: CEO Office Intern, LeadBest Consulting Group
exp_list.intro: Developed payroll conversion pipeline and researched OpenKM.
details: Developed payroll conversion pipeline and researched OpenKM.
Assisted the marketing team in surveying industry research related to digital transformation, NFTs, and Web3.

leadership_list.title: President, NTUEE Student Association
details: Led a team of 35 officers providing services to 900+ students.

Founded the industry department and led a 30+ member team to organize campus events and provide post-event data analysis for corporate partners, including Corporate Workshops (BenQ, Line), Internship Info Platforms, Corporate Sharing Sessions (Amazon, Google, NXP, WorldQuant).

leadership_list.title: Co-Founder, NTU Shepherd Plan
details: Co-founded Taiwan’s largest student-led academic exploration initiative, reaching 15,000+ high school students.
Led a team of 60+ lecturers delivering 100+ technical workshops and interactive online lectures to reduce the mismatch between student interests and chosen fields.
Raised US$50K+ in donations from multiple companies.

project_list.title: MultiLingual Speech-to-Text (The Third Place in Interspeech Challenge 2025)
project_list.abstract: Developed a weighted fine-tuning approach for the Whisper model to recognize previously unseen languages, achieving 3rd place overall (1st in the dialect metric) at the Interspeech 2025 Challenge.

project_list.title: Taipei City EOC Dashboard (Champion, 2024 Spring Taipei City Codefest Hackathon)
project_list.abstract: Developed an interactive dashboard for a national-level hackathon, winning 1st place; integrated our codebase into the main repository. Implemented end-to-end data pipelines and scheduling using Apache Airflow and cloud deployment tools.

project_list.title: Fine-tuning LLaVA for Autonomous Driving Scenarios
project_list.abstract: Fine-tuned the LLaVA model using Low-Rank Adaptation (LoRA) with a SAM-based visual projector, boosting Image QA performance by 60% on complex autonomous driving scenes.
